com.redhat.rhn.domain.server.test
Class GuestBuilder

java.lang.Object
  com.redhat.rhn.domain.server.test.GuestBuilder

public class GuestBuilder
extends java.lang.Object

GuestBuilder is a class based on the GoF Builder pattern that constructs VirtualInstance guests.

Constructor Detail

GuestBuilder

public GuestBuilder(User theOwner)
Method Detail

build

public VirtualInstance build()
                      throws GuestBuilderException
This is the final step in building or compiling a guest. The builder does not maintain a reference to a guest once it is built; so, calling build successive times will simply return null. One of the create methods must be called before every invocation of this method.

Returns:
The built virtual instance
Throws:
GuestBuilderException - if the guest is not registered and has no host.

createUnregisteredGuest

public GuestBuilder createUnregisteredGuest()
Creates a guest with a random uuid. An unregistered guest has no guest system associated with it. Note that a host must be specified for the unregistered guest under construction prior to calling build().

Parameters:
host - A physical, host system
Returns:
This builder

createGuest

public GuestBuilder createGuest()
                         throws java.lang.Exception
Creates a guest with a random uuid and an associated registered virtual system. The guest has no host.

Returns:
This builder
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs

withPersistence

public GuestBuilder withPersistence()
Tells the builder that the guest under construction should be persisted to the database. This will also result in the hibernate session being flushed, and the guest and its guest and host systems will be evicted from the session.

Returns:
This builder

withNonVirtHost

public GuestBuilder withNonVirtHost()
                             throws java.lang.Exception
Creates the host for the guest under construction. The host will have a management entitlement. It will not have any virtualization entitlements.

Returns:
This builder
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs.

withVirtHost

public GuestBuilder withVirtHost()
                          throws java.lang.Exception
Creates the host for the guest under construction. The host will have a Virtualization Host entitlement.

Returns:
This builder
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs.

withNonVirtHostInAnotherOrg

public GuestBuilder withNonVirtHostInAnotherOrg()
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
Creates a host for the guest under construction. The host will be created in a different org than the one the guest belongs to. The host will not have any virtualization entitlements.

Returns:
This builder
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs

withVirtHostInAnotherOrg

public GuestBuilder withVirtHostInAnotherOrg()
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

withVirtPlatformHost

public GuestBuilder withVirtPlatformHost()
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
Creates the host for the guest under construction. The host will have a Virtualization Platform entitlement.

Returns:
This builder
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if an error occurs
